title: WHY THE FUCK IS EVERYONE SO FUCKING TOXIC
body: I am so sick of it. Someone steals a buff they feed for the rest of the game. Honestly this whole community is a bunch of fucking assholes who honestly deserve to die. Fuck the devs and fuck the people. This game is a waste of my fucking time.

replies.body: When people say: report this :insert champion here: and when you ask them why, their response is absolutely fucking nothing.

Love the title man, very self explanatory.

But if you think 1 guy stealing a buff and feeding is what lost you the game, you wasted your own time.
Woah man, fuck the people? Some players are underage. I wouldn't risk it tbh

All you can do is report those summoners and try to describe accurately how they broke the summoners code. 

There are plenty of toxic people in OCE sure but think of the other regions. 

I've had games in a row where my team has flamed each other into tilting and afking and like games are lost off this. 

All I do is report those summoners after the game and hope my teammates are doing the same thing so justice is served!

Reads OP, wonders why OP is so toxic?

People who post in such a way on forums often type the same way in chat, and are themselves the cause of toxicity.

It really is, I just had a team instantly and brutally flame me for leaving a teamfight after it was 99% over and I was 100hp with no abilities or even flash. I explain this and they still call me a %%%% and tell me to kill myself and that I needed to "stop being a bitch and help the team you selfish fuck"
Tagging self in to see RITO try deny this
Wish I could disagree but, he's not wrong...

violence begets violence... someone did something toxic, so you posted a toxic message... right?

besides that the feeder sounds like a typical child or grown-child :p
